Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Hydra makes as many Bite attacks as it has heads

Abilities.Ability 1: Hold Breath, The Hydra can hold its breath for hours
Abilities.Ability 2: Multiple Heads, The Hydra typically has 5 heads.  Having multiple makes it incridibly difficult to blind, charm, deafen, frighten, stun or knock the Hydra unconscious.  If all the Hydra's heads are cut off it dies, however, it will regrow two heads for each one it loses unless the cut is cauterized with fire
Abilities.Ability 3: Reactive Heads, Each of the Hydra's heads can be used for Opportunity Attacks
Abilities.Ability 4: Wakeful, At least one of the Hydra's head remains awake while the rest sleep
